description: Styles for the Ultralight template with a focus on a minimal and clean design for the Tic Tac Toe frontend.

classes.name: page-container
classes.description: A flex container that centers its content both vertically and horizontally with minimum height and padding.

classes.name: main-title
classes.description: The main title style, defining font size, weight, alignment, color, margin, letter spacing, and line height.
